changes.title: AccountManager
changes.description: First version of the AccountManager, with basic features

changes.title: LookAround
changes.description: Added LookAround functionality in InventoryMove, gives the player the opportunity to look around while in inventory

changes.title: Configs
changes.description: Rework of the way the config system loads visuals

changes.title: TimeChanger
changes.description: Fixed a bug where it would show the time presets even though the checkbox was disabled

changes.title: Disabler
changes.description: Removed disabler module, since it was useless

changes.title: AutoClicker
changes.description: Nobody needs an auto clicker, so we removed it

changes.title: TriggerBot
changes.description: TriggerBot depends on the auto clicker, so we removed it as well
